column4: Latest;Battambang: The Ministry of Culture and Fine Arts has denied any requests to demolish the old stone bridge ( Spean Thmor Chas) located in front of Provincial Hall in Kamakor Village
column6: Battambang. The bridge is more than 100 years old and built during the colonial era and one of the oldest pieces of heritage in the town.------Experts are to be drafted in to give a detailed report on the state of the structure and come up with plans to restore it. ------On December 15
column7: the Battambang Provincial Hall announced a ban------ on pedestrians crossing the bridge due to deteriorating condition. ------The bridge was built in 1916. ------KPT
